tool.name: Blast Tabular Dice Filter

param.label: Minimum dice score
param.help: Blast results with a dice score below this value will be removed
param.name: min_dice

tool.help:
**What it does**
Filters your tabular BLAST results based on a dice score thresholding process.
**How it works**
The tool processes BLAST results line by line, at each line calculating the dice score. The equation for the dice score is as follows::
2 * number of identical matches / (query sequence length + subject sequence length)
The denominator normalizes the score by accounting for the length of both sequences. A pairwise alignment is required to have between 50-100% identity.
